Definitions.Paraphrase:
alone; lonely; without companions
独自的，孤独的
a solitary traveler 
一位孤独的旅行者
She lives a solitary life. 
她过着孤独的生活。
A solitary tree remained standing after the hurricane. 
飓风过后，惟有一棵树孤独地挺立在那儿。

[C]a large, grass-eating animal, the male of which has antlers 
鹿
a herd of deer 
一群鹿
Deer are found throughout the world, except in Africa and Australia. 
除了非洲和澳洲，世界各地都有鹿。

[C]a wild animal of the dog family 
狼
Wolves kill sheep and sometimes even attack men. 
狼群捕杀羊，有时甚至还会攻击人。
Wolves hunt in packs. 
狼是成群猎食的。

1. make sb. or sth. easy to control
制服，控制并利用
tame a river
治理河流
Atomic energy has been tamed and harnessed for useful work. 
原子能已被控制并得到实际应用。
2. train an animal or bird not to be afraid of humans and to be obedient
驯化，驯服
tame a tiger
驯虎
He tamed the wild horse. 
他驯服了那匹野马。

(esp. of animals) not wild or fierce, either naturally or because of training or long involvement with humans 
（尤指动物）温顺的，驯化的
The birds in the park are quite tame and will take food from your hand. 
公园的鸟很温顺，它们会吃你亲手喂给它们的食物。
He keeps a tame bear as a pet. 
他养着一头驯服的熊作为宠物。

[C]an area of water smaller than a lake, often artificially made 
池塘
a fish pond
鱼塘
She has a duck pond at the bottom of her garden. 
她在花园深处有个养鸭塘。

[U, C] (a person or thing that causes) a feeling of wanting and being able to do sth. good, create a work of art, etc. 
灵感，鼓舞人心的人或事物
Wordsworth found (his) inspiration in the lake district. 
华兹华斯从湖泊地区获得灵感。
His hard work is a constant inspiration to us all. 
他刻苦工作的态度不断地激励着我们每个人。
A brave leader is an inspiration to his followers. 
勇敢的首领对于他的追随者是一种鼓舞。

[U] the situation of being alone without other people 
独居，独处
People need a chance to reflect on spiritual matters in solitude. 
人们需要独处的机会来反思精神上的事情。
He enjoys the solitude of his own flat. 
他喜欢在自己的公寓套间里独居。

[U] the light that comes from the sun
阳光，日光
The early morning sunlight shone through the curtains. 
清晨的阳光透过窗帘照了进来。
Our garden gets a lot of sunlight. 
我们的花园充满阳光。

(fml.) kind and gentle
善良的，慈祥的
She is beautiful and benign and the embodiment of all the finest qualities of a loyal and loving wife.   
她非常漂亮温柔，体现了一位忠贞可爱的妻子的全部美德。

a bag filled with feathers, etc. to make a seat more comfortable 
坐垫，靠垫
sit on a cushion 
坐在垫子上
She leaned back against the cushions. 
她向后靠在垫子上。

[U] poems in general 
（总称）诗，诗歌
She has just published a collection of poetry. 
她刚出版了一本诗集。
She started writing poetry at a young age. 
她年纪很小的时候就开始写诗了。

[U] (a person's style of) writing done with a pen or pencil 
书法，笔迹
We need to ensure that handwriting is properly taught in our primary schools. 
我们需要确保小学的书法教育是恰当的。
His handwriting is impossible to read. 
他的笔迹认不出来。

speak (sth.) aloud for another person or for a machine to record the words said, so that they may be written down 
听写，口授
She spent the morning dictating letters to her secretary. 
她花了一上午向她的秘书口述信件。
I dictated my order over the phone. 
我通过电话口授命令。

[C]a covered metal or plastic container with a handle and a spout used for boiling water 
水壶，锅
an electric kettle 
电水壶，电锅
The kettle is boiling.
壶里的水开了。
The kettle is singing.
(水将沸时)水壶在响。

1. [C]a person who has a leadership position in a certain field 
（某一领域中）占有领导地位的人，领导者
a high priest of science
科学泰斗   
a priest of art
艺术宗师
2. [C]a person, usu. a man, who has been trained to perform religious duties in the Christian church, esp. the Roman Catholic church, or a person with particular duties in some other religions
神甫，牧师，（基督教教会以外的）神职人员
a Catholic priest 
天主教牧师
a remarkable old Irish priest 
一位杰出的爱尔兰老牧师

[C]a small, simple building 
小屋
a grass hut 
茅舍
The workmen put up a hut where they could have their food. 
工人们搭了一间小屋，可以在里面吃饭。
The people of the village live in neat huts with grass roofs. 
村民们住在整洁的茅草屋中。

[C]a tool with a handle and a metal blade used for cutting down trees and cutting wood into pieces 
斧子
He used an axe to chop the old apple tree down. 
他用斧子砍倒了老苹果树。

[C]a small curved plate which one puts a cup on 
茶托
a cup and saucer 
带茶托的茶杯

1. [U] the clothes and sheets which need to be or have been washed 
要洗的或刚洗好的衣物
When shall we do the laundry? 
我们什么时候洗衣服？
Has the laundry come back yet? 
送洗的衣物送回来了吗？
2. [C] a business which washes clothes, sheets, etc. for customers 
洗衣店
a self-service laundry 
自助洗衣房
run a laundry 
开洗衣店

[C, U]one's idea or opinion of oneself, or a great feeling of one's own importance and ability 
自我，自负，自尊心
That man has got such an enormous ego — I've never known anyone so full of themselves. 
那个人非常自负，我从来没有见过那么以自我为中心的人。
I'm glad she got the job — she needed something to boost her ego. 
我很高兴她得到了那份工作——她需要那份工作来增强她的自尊心。

1. having a low opinion of oneself; not proud 
谦逊的，谦虚的
Many famous people are surprisingly humble. 
许多名人出人意料地谦虚。
He strikes me as a very humble person. 
他的谦虚给我留下了深刻的印象。
2. not great or important 
地位（或身份）低下的，不显要的
I do quite a humble job at the hospital. 
我在医院从事很普通的工作。
We live in a humble little village. 
我们住在一个普通的小村庄里。

not being somewhere or not existing 
缺席的，不在的
He has been absent from school for three days now. 
他已经三天没来上课了。
We drank a toast to absent friends. 
我们为缺席的朋友干一杯。

[C]a word or statement to say one is sorry for having done sth. wrong or for upsetting sb. 
道歉，认错
I made no apology for what I said — it was a fair comment. 
我不打算为自己说的话道歉——我的评论是公正的。
I have an apology to make to you — I'm afraid I opened your letter by mistake. 
我得向你道歉——我误拆了你的信。

become thoroughly wet as a result of being placed in liquid or absorbing liquid; make sth. thoroughly wet in this way 
浸泡，（使）湿透
soak bread in milk 
把面包浸在牛奶中
I thought I'd leave my trousers to soak for a while to get the worst of the dirt out. 
我想把我的裤子浸泡一会儿，以便能把污渍去掉。

[C]a measure for liquid equal to about half a litre
品脱
one pint of milk
一品脱牛奶
A pint is equal to 0.568 of a litre. 
一品脱等于0.568公升。

not allowing water to go through 
防水的，不透水的
waterproof material 
防水材料
You'll need something waterproof on top of that sweater if you're going walking in the hills. 
如果你要在山间行走的话，你需要在那件毛衣外面套件防水的衣服。

1. difficult to hold or to stand on, drive on, etc. 
滑的
The roads are slippery after rain. 
雨后道路很滑。
Drive very carefully; the roads are wet and slippery. 
开车要特别小心，道路又湿又滑。
Once you've given in to temptation for the first time you've on the slippery slope. 
一旦你经不住第一次诱惑，以后就无法抵制得住。
2. (infml.) not to be trusted, shifty
不可靠的, 狡猾的
Don't lend any money to that slippery person. 
不要借钱给那个狡猾的家伙。
He's as slippery as an eel — you can never get a straight answer out of him. 
他像鳝鱼般难以捉摸——你永远不可能从他口里得到直接的回答。

1. (make sb.) become unable to speak 
说不出话来
The surprise farewell party left them all choked up. 
这一意外的告别聚会令他们激动得说不出话来。
She was choked with anger. 
她气得说不出话来。
2. stop or partly stop breathing 
窒息
The smoke almost choked the fireman. 
消防队员几乎被烟熏得透不过气来。
An elderly man choked to death in his home. 
昨天一个老人在家因窒息而死。

[C]an object or collection of objects wrapped in paper, esp. so that it / they can be sent by post 
包裹
a parcel of books tied with string 
用绳子系住的一包书
Because it was her birthday she got several parcels and lots of cards. 
因为过生日，她收到几个包裹和好多贺卡。

1. highest in rank or position 
（地位、权力等）最高的，至上的
a supreme ruler 
最高统治者
the supreme court
（联邦、州）最高法院
An American general was appointed Supreme Allied Commander in Europe. 
一位美国将军被任命为驻欧盟军的最高司令。
2. highest in degree 
（程度上）最大的，极度的
It required a supreme effort of will to stop myself from laughing. 
我尽了最大努力克制自己才没有笑出声来。
Soldiers who die for their country are said to have made the supreme sacrifice. 
为国捐躯的将士被认为是做出了最大的牺牲。

1. [C] a judge in a law court 
法官
The justice found him guilty and sentenced him to five years in prison. 
法官判他有罪,入狱5年。
Mr. Justice Smith 
法官史密斯先生
2. [U] fairness between people 
公正，正义
There's no justice in the world when people can be made to suffer like that. 
如果人们被迫遭受这样的痛苦，那么世上就没有公正了。
All men should be treated with justice. 
所有的人都应受到公正对待。
3. [U] the putting of the law into action 
司法，审判
The system of justice in this country consists of a series of law courts at different levels. 
这个国家的司法体制是由一系列不同级别的法庭组成。
Never expect that you can escape from justice. 
不要以为你能逍遥法外。

[C, U]meat, esp. from cattle, usu. sold as a thick slice, which can be cooked quite quickly 
牛排
Shall we have steak for dinner? 
我们晚饭吃牛排吧？
How would you like your steak？ 
你的牛排要几分熟？

(usu. pl.) a strip of paste made with water, flour and egg
面条
Foods such as instant noodles are popular as snacks. 
速食面之类的食品是流行快餐。

[C] (pl. -men) a person who plays sport, esp. one who is good at it 
运动员
He'll be remembered as a true sportsman. 
人们将把他作为一名真正的运动员牢记在心中。
He is a very keen sportsman. 
他非常热衷于运动。

[C]a boot with a thick metal blade on the bottom that is used for skating 
滑冰鞋
an ice skate 
冰鞋
a roller skate 
旱冰鞋
I've just got some roller skates, but I can't balance very well on them yet. 
我刚得到一双新的旱冰鞋，但我穿上后还不能非常好地保持平衡。

move, dance, etc. on skates 
溜冰，滑冰
The ice on the river is thick enough to skate on. 
河上的冰有足够的厚度可以（让人）在上面滑。
She skates beautifully. 
她溜冰的姿势很优美。

[C]a person who skates
溜冰者，滑冰者
There are lots of skaters in the park today.
今天公园里有许多滑冰者。
He is a very skilled ice skater. 
他是溜冰好手。

[C]one of a pair of long narrow strips of wood, etc. that are attached to one's feet for gliding over snow 
滑雪板
I've just bought a new pair of skis. 
我刚买了一副新滑雪板。

move on skis 
滑雪
I'm learning to ski. 
我正在学滑雪。
He skied down the hill, past the forest, and into the village. 
他滑雪下山坡，经过森林，进入村庄。

[C]a person who skis 
滑雪者
After the heavy snow, there were lots of skiers on the mountain. 
大雪过后，山上有许多滑雪者。
He's a good skier.
他是一位优秀的滑雪者。

[C]a daughter of sb.'s brother or sister, or a daughter of sb.'s husband's or wife's brother or sister
侄女，甥女
My brother's two daughters are my nieces. 
我兄弟的两个女儿是我的侄女。

[U] any substance in the form of fine particles 
粉，粉末
milk powder 
奶粉
A packet of white powder was found and police scientists are analyzing it. 
发现了一包白色粉末，侦破专家正在对其进行分析。

in the form of fine particles 
粉状的
powdered chocolate 
巧克力粉
Shall I put some powdered milk in your coffee? 
要不要我在你的咖啡里加点奶粉？

[C]an important female member of a royal family, esp. a daughter or granddaughter of a king and queen, or the wife of a prince 
公主，王妃，亲王夫人
three young princesses from Nepal 
来自尼泊尔的三位年轻公主
Lady Diana Spencer became Princess Diana when she married Prince Charles. 
戴安娜·斯宾塞女士在与查尔斯王子结婚后成为戴安娜王妃。

1. close an entrance or a container with sth. that stops air, water, etc. from coming in or going out 
密闭，闭紧，钉住
All the air is removed from a can of food before it is sealed. 
食品罐头密封之前，里面的空气已除尽。
The windows have been sealed up for years. 
这些窗户都已经密封了许多年了。
2. close an envelope, pack, etc. by using sth. sticky to hold its edges in place 
封，密封
He sealed the envelope and put a stamp on it. 
他封上信封，然后贴上邮票。

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
purposely 
故意，特意
She did it on purpose, of course. 
她当然是故意那样做的。
If you joke with him, he'll think you're insulting him on purpose.
如果你和他开玩笑，他会认为你在故意羞辱他。

used to show the other side of an argument 
另一方面，而
He is clever, but on the other hand, he makes many mistakes. 
他很聪明，可另一方面，他犯了很多错。
Food here is cheaper than in Britain; clothing, on the other hand, is much dearer. 
这里的食品比英国便宜；而衣服却要贵得多。

make sb. leave a place, or refuse to accept sb. as part of a group 
赶出，驱逐
He claimed to have the power to cast out demons. 
他声称有能力驱鬼。
He was cast out of the best society. 
他为上流社会所摈弃。

express a good opinion of (sb. or sth.) 
对……给予高度评价，赞扬
They spoke highly of his behavior. 
他们对他的行为赞颂备至。
She is very highly spoken of. 
人们给予她非常高的评价。

find (sth. or sb.) by looking hard 
找出，搜寻出
He managed to seek out his friend in the crowd. 
他设法在人群中找出了自己的朋友。  
The magazine is seeking out readers' opinions. 
这本杂志正在征求读者的意见。

dress oneself in (clothing) 
穿上
She put her hat and coat on.
她戴好帽子，穿上外套。
He put on his glasses to read the letter. 
他戴上眼镜读信。

start a journey 
启程，动身
Columbus set forth with three small ships. 
哥伦布率领三只小船出发了。
It's getting late — time to set forth. 
时间不早了——该出发了。

record (sth.) in writing 
写下，记下
The judge had to write all the evidence down in longhand. 
法官不得不亲笔记下所有证言。
She wrote down every word he said. 
她把他所说的每个字都记了下来。

lengthen (sth.) by pulling; (cause to) reach forward, as with the hands 
拉长，伸长，伸出
The process often stretches out to years, even decades. 
这一过程常要延续好几年，甚至几十年。
He stretched out on the grass. 
他手脚伸开着躺在草地上。

(cause to) become completely full 
装满，占满
Please fill up the tank with petrol. 
请给油箱加满汽油。
The rain has filled up the ditches again. 
雨又一次把水沟灌满了。

remain late out of bed, as at night 
熬夜
Don't stay up late every night. 
不要每晚都熬夜。
You've got class tomorrow. I don't want you staying up late. 
你明天有课，我不想让你熬夜。

increase and decrease in a kind of pattern 
涨落，盛衰
Toby has spent his life comparing the way cililiza- tions rise and fall. 
托比一生都在比较各种文明是怎样兴盛衰亡的。

1. (cause to) block up
（使）积压，（使）拥塞
The port was backed up. 
港口拥塞。
The correspondence has been backing up for several days. 
待处理的信件已积压了好几天。
Many vehicles were backed up at the crossroads because of the accident. 
由于事故，很多车辆被堵在十字路口。
2. support, esp. in an argument 
支持
Harries will back me up wholeheartedly as he used to. 
哈里斯会像过去一样全心全意地支持我。
The policeman wouldn't have believed me if you hadn't backed me up. 
如果你当时不支持我，警察是不会相信我的。

for a long time or in great detail 
长久地，详尽地
He talked at length about his work and family. 
他详细地谈了他的工作和家庭。
We have already discussed this matter at length. 
我们已详细讨论过这件事了。

in a row of people standing one behind the other while waiting for sth. 
（排）成一行，（排）成一队
You are not in line with the others. 
你没有和别人排成一行。
The children stood in line. 
孩子们排成一队。

have a great liking for (sb. or sth.) 
喜爱，喜欢
Did you ever see anyone so fond of dancing? 
你见过有谁这么爱跳舞吗？
She seems fond of him. 
她似乎喜欢他。

become quiet and calm or make sb. do this; start to feel happy and confident with a new situation 
安静下来，安下心来，适应（或习惯于）新环境
He settled down to do his homework. 
他安下心来做家庭作业。
I'm sure the child will soon settle down in his new school. 
我确信这孩子很快就会对新学校习惯起来。

in spite of what has been said, done or expected 
毕竟，终究
The day turned out fine after all. 
结果天还是转晴了。
This is, after all, the least important part of the problem.
这毕竟是问题最无足轻重的部分。

for a short period of time from now, but not permanently 
暂时，眼下
All is well, for the time being. 
眼下一切顺利。
He wanted to stop but decided to continue for the time being. 
他原想停止，但又决定暂且继续干下去。

do sth. because it seems best in the circumstances, though often reluctantly 
最好做某事，不妨做某事
I might as well go. 
我最好还是去。
Since you can't win the race, you might as well quit. 
既然你赢不了这场赛跑，倒不如退出比赛。
梭罗（Henry David Thoreau, 1817-1862，美国作家，超验主义运动的代表人物，主张回归自然）
威廉（本文指威廉·华兹华斯 William Wordsworth, 1770-1850，英国诗人，作品歌颂大自然，开创了浪漫主义新诗风）
弥尔顿(本文指John Milton,1608-1674，英国诗人)
瓦尔登湖，或译为沃尔登塘，位于美国马萨诸塞州东北部，康科德之南；1845-1847年梭罗（H. D. Thoreau）在此隐居并产生灵感撰写其名著《沃尔登，或林中生活》（Walden, or Life in the Woods）
